snippet: The demographic revolution in America has pushed the census’ outdated notion of race to the breaking point.
abstract: Op-Ed article by Kenneth Prewitt, former director of United States Census Bureau, maintains bureau persists in using antiquated racial classifications and therefore statistics do not reflect the demographic changes in American society; outlines improvements to bureau's questions.
lead_paragraph: The demographic revolution in America has pushed the census’ outdated notion of race to the breaking point.

headline.main: Fix the Census’ Archaic Racial Categories
headline.print_headline: Fix the Census’ Archaic Racial Categories
